text: Look! Look, look, look! Something's coming!
Alright, everyone! Let's get this party started!
There he is! Our challenger for the evening!
Welcome to our gilded paradise─the Gold Saucer.

Now, now. When fate sets us a challenge,
we must rise to meet it!
I trust we're feeling limber now?
Let's see if you have what it takes, young man!
At least put up a fight!
Close, but no cigar, young man.

Let's give our worthy contender another
thunderous round of applause!
A small token of my thanks.
One golden ticket. Your ticket to paradise.

Cloud's used to performing in front of crowds.
You should've seen him at the Honeybee Inn.
Oh, you've got to tell me that one later!
I must say, your duel with Dio earlier was a sight to behold.
The stage calls to you─begs for you to bear your soul upon it.
The park director requires my talents for a show.
My fancy footwork, to be precise.
What do you say? Shall we cut a rug?
Not even the limelight can melt that icy heart.
Should you ever find yourself in a dancing mood, I have just the part for you.
Nothing would inspire me more than casting Cloud Strife in one of my productions.
Don't let me keep you two from all the fun. Go on, please. Experience all the Saucer has to offer.
So, now that we're here...let's have some fun!
Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy!
Sure. Sounds like a plan to me.
I had my fill of fun in Costa del Sol.
Let's put it to a vote, then!
A teensy little break! All those in favor!
Maybe you should lie down for a bit.

C'mon, man, I know this ain't your scene.
Why don't you and me go book us some rooms?
Well! The four of us are off!
What the hell is wrong with those guys?
Mako. When it's gone, so's this.

But I get your point. Live it up while you can.
Future's not promised to no one.

Waltzing around with a
flower seller and Hojo's lab rat.
At least they're finally on a real wanted list.
That's all well and good, but why am I in charge of handing out the posters!?
Don't they know I have a division to run!?
I think you're where the president wants you.

This is what the planet's dyin' for?
This is why we're bleedin' her dry!?

Siphoned straight from the lifestream─
from her veins!
A man with a rain cloud over his head!
So how about a reading to clear those somber skies?
Whether it be dark or bright, I'll read your future right! Just...dinnae go shootin' the messenger, eh?
Hmph. It's a toy, alright. Pretty lifelike though.
C'mon, pal, give us a smile!
The Gold Saucer's meant to be a happy place filled with happy people, don't you know!
So show us those pearly whites.
Someone's got a bee in their bonnet!

And I thought the outside was tacky...
Seems classy now.
What in the hell was that!?
Heh heh... My most sincere apologies.
Got any rooms? There's six of us, all told.
Might I inquire as to what kind of pet?
He was joking. Make it six.

Oh, I'm terribly sorry, gentlemen, but it appears
we're all booked up for the night.
For cryin' out loud... What about the other hotels?

but according to my records,
all of our hotels are sadly fully booked.
Now then, did you want one suite or two?

I wouldnae dream of such a thing! And to prove it,
I'll foot the entire bill myself!
Well, aren't we a prickly bunch!

You there─dangly man.
Would ye mind checkin' one more time?
The Tonberry and Eligor Suites have just become available! Shall I book them for you?

It feels so good to do good!
Alright, lads. Enjoy your stay!
Your suites are on the fourth floor.

Please proceed to the elevator
at the top of the stairs.
Hehehe... I hope your chambers are to your liking.
Once you check in here, there's no backing out. Hehehe...

The offer still stands!
A fortune or two to steer you true!

But of course!
Be it this, be it that─go on and ask the cat!
Alright! Hold on to your underpants!
"Things are looking up, so throw caution to the wind.
"Put your trust in others, and a last-minute twist...may pleasantly surprise you"?
What's this gotta do with Sephiroth?
Give me another chance. I'll get it this time! Come on!
Wait, don't go! Third time's the charm!
"Seek and you are sure to find. But alas, you shall forever lose...what you cherish most"?
The stars work in mysterious ways!
Yeah, it's just... "What I cherish most"?
Odd. My readings are normally bang on.
Stars mustnae be smilin' on me.
You wish to go down, I presume?
Oh, of course... Very well, fourth floor it is.
Yes, of course! One moment please!
It says here you canceled those rooms?

While we did have you booked for
the Tonberry and Eligor Suites...

Mr. Palmer sent word that
they were no longer required.
Well, no point dwelling on it!

Now─where can a man get a drink around here?
Yoo-hoo, waitress?
Farewell. We hope you have yourselves a ghoulish and morbid evening.
Startin' to miss Johnny's Seaside Fleatrap...
I'm gonna head out for a bit.
But not for fun! Just to take a walk.
Hey. You've been acting pretty weird lately, Cloud. Rest up and shake it off, y'hear me?
Sorry, man. Feel like I failed you.
Thought I'd come see how you were holding up.
You're still under the weather, huh?
So does that mean you'd be up for a little sightseeing with yours truly?
Just so happens the Skywheel's running a special for couples.

I'll leave that up to your imagination.
It's more fun that way.
Hey, how're you feeling? Do you need anything? Some food? Water?
I'm fine. You were right─just needed some sleep.
Yeah, Red's off doing his own thing, and Aerith and Yuffie are taking a spin on the Skywheel.
They're only letting couples on tonight.
So here I am─the odd woman out.

They hit it off quick, huh?
Must be nice to make friends that easily.

I act like I can.
Think I always have...ever since I was a kid.

Anyway, you up for a little exploring?
With me, I mean. No pressure.
Oh, good, you're up. Perfect timing!
I need someone to keep me company while I check out the park.
This place is actually kinda lame when you're on your own.
Aerith and Tifa went on the Skywheel together─just the two of them! Talk about rude, leaving the new girl behind.
Forgot you were "the new girl." Sure don't act like it.
I slide in, buddy up, and then─yoink!
Going down to the lobby, sir?
We hope you enjoy your stay.
Wherever it is you're off to today, allow me to be your guide─your moogle guide!
Where would you like to go, kupo?
We look forward to serving you again soon, kupo!
Hold on to your hats, kupo!
We look forward to serving you again soon, kupo!
Your trusty guide moogle is at your service!
Just name the square and I'll getcha there!
Where would you like to go, kupo?
Hold on to your hats, kupo!
Let's get you to Battle Square quick, kupo!
You're needed at the colosseum right away!
Welcome to the Gold Saucer, kupo!

You'll find the main entrance just up ahead!
We hope you enjoy your stay with us!

Welcome to Wonderment Square, kupo!
Oh, looks like this is your first time here! Enjoy!
Welcome to Chocobo Square, kupo! The racing birds here are as kweh-k as lightning!
Welcome to Speed Square, kupo! Nice going! You'll be able to zip back here lickety-split now!
Welcome to Battle Square, kupo! Now you can jet back here whenever you're in the mood to roughhouse!
Welcome to Event Square, kupo! That's another location added to your list! Good job!
Welcome to Skywheel Square, kupo! Remember: when you wanna visit again, just say the word!
I spy something a certain all-action mercenary might like!
That's what all the old fogeys say.

Whatever...
Let's see how it stacks up against the real thing.

This place looks fun, huh? ...Now we're talkin'!
That one's practically calling your name.
You're afraid of a little video game?

Whatever...
Let's see how it stacks up against the real thing.
I've died and gone to gaming heaven! Where do we even start?

Oho, that a motorcycle I spy over there?
Y'know, Aerith and Tifa talked your skills up...

said you really knew how to stick it to the man!
So hop on and show me whatcha got!
Too tough for Mister Cool, huh?

Whatever...
Let's see how it stacks up against the real thing.
Let's see how it stacks up against the real thing.
Wow, look at that score! Guess I've awoken the child within.
Put up more of a fight than you thought, huh?
I'm gonna go out on a limb and say you're not the gaming type.
Knew you'd kill it! Nothing like real-world expertise!
Not bad at all. Guess ya haven't lost your touch!
Oh... Well...better here than on the open road, right?
Okay! I figured you'd be good, but wow!
This is what Aerith'n Tifa were ravin' about? It's a miracle you got outta Midgar alive...
Aha, I knew you'd come crawling outta your room eventually.
I mean─seriously─who could resist the siren song of the Saucer?
Yeah... Got a little sidetracked and wound up losing the others.
You know, you could tag along with us.
Well, feel free to join us, if you want.

And be a third wheel?
No, thanks... I know when I'm not wanted.
Need to chill for a sec anyway.
Daddy needs a new pair of shoes!
This is some kinda race today, folks. In all my years in the booth, only seen a couple this close!
So, Cloud, which bird do you think is gonna take home the win?
Well, Aerith, considering their plumage and breeding, I think the choice is clear.

Wow, you really can get sucked into this.
Can see how people end up in debt.
Oh, prob'ly should place a bet first.

Welcome to the chocobo racetrack.
Do you currently have a membership with us, sir?
but I'm afraid our services are for members only.
Oh... That's too bad. Might've been fun.
All of our guests are more than welcome to watch the races on the monitors, however.
Only members are allowed to use the services here, I'm afraid.
All guests are free to watch the races on our monitors.
Oh, hello, Mr. Strife! We're all looking forward to seeing you in action again.
What was I thinking, picking that bird?
When you see one of Sam's birds in a race, you know who's coming in first.
Ugh, there's no way he'll keep it up─you'll see!
Quit being naive. Look at the facts─Sam's won every race!
Nobody stays on top forever. Don't come cryin' to me when he loses.
There's just no helping some people...
Ugh, I'm sick and tired of seein' our bird come in last.
Oughta put the poor bastard "out to pasture." Nab ourselves a new one.
Best do it soon, or the boss'll freak.
It ain't just about the chocobo, though. A good bird ain't worth a damn if her jockey's shit.
So we gonna have to "retire" our rider too?
This area's for jockeys only. Unless you're staff or support crew, I can't let you in.
Oh, Cloud! You're up! Feeling any better?
Yeah. You were right─just needed some sleep.

I am a little surprised to see you, though.
Must've been some nap.
Takin' a break from the fun?
So...what're ya up to? Just chillin'?
Pretty much. I could feel a headache coming on, so...
Oh yeah, I'll be fine. I...I'm just not used to all these lights and sounds is all.
But I'll head to the hotel soon. Don't worry.
Seeing all these chocobos kinda makes me miss Piko. Wonder how he's doing.
No, you idiot! Take the inside lane─the inside!
My blood pressure can't take this─ Oh! An opening! Run, run!
You had better not screw this up again, I swear to god...
Yes! Yes, you've got it! C'mon, you big beautiful bird!
That's cheating... He cheated! I oughta wring your scrawny little neck!
Why that lousy─! Get him. Get him!
Grind him into the dirt! Make him wish he'd never been born!
I never would've expected to run into you here.
Honestly, darling, if you wanted to spend time with me, you only had to ask.
What are you doing in this place?
My little jaunt to Costa del Sol proved...fruitful.
Ugh... And now I'm flushing all that gil down the toilet!

I swear, every time,
one of Sam's chocobos takes first.
Prob'ly doping his birds, the con artist.
Enough about me though─what about you? Surely you've got better things to do than listen to me vent.

Like paying attention to your girlfriend.
Go have fun─before she gets bored with you.

Oh, please, don't tell me you're out alone.
My god, that is depressing.
Cloud. The Gold Saucer was all but designed for date night! So run along. Find yourself a pretty young thing.
Sam must be making an absolute killing at these races.
Maybe I should expand too─open a parlor here at the Saucer.
Welcome, cadets, to Space Ranger HQ!
Our mission today is a vital one, and we will need your wholehearted support to defeat the enemy!
You wanna be a space ranger too?
Prefer to keep my feet on the ground.
Is that how you were back when you enlisted?
Not quite that green. I hope.
Oh man, that sounds awesome! I wanna join!
Welcome, cadets, to Space Ranger HQ!
Our mission today is a vital one, and we will need your wholehearted support to defeat the enemy!
The Gilgamesh Army is amassing a fleet of starcruisers on the dark side of Moon VII.
You and your squadron will lead our assault, and break through the enemy's defensive lines.
From there, you will strike at the very heart of their fleet, in a bid to destroy their dread flagship.
Your actions will decide not only the outcome of this war, but the fate of the galaxy. Space rangers, ho!
You do just fine with your feet off the ground, mister.
Little more training, and you'll be soaring with the best of 'em.
If I ever go into space, remind me to find a new bodyguard, okay?
If I didn't know better, I'd say you've done that before!
Hey, for your first voyage into space, that wasn't half bad!
It's your first time. Don't beat yourself up.
That was amazing! If you ever go to space for real, I'm comin' with!
Not the worst, but you might need some more training, cadet!
Yeesh! And you call yourself a space ranger?
If you were fighting or not.
Not gonna lie, I'm a teensy bit jealous. This place just isn't that fun when you're all by yourself.
There must be someone out there who'd wanna hang out with a cool person like me.
This isn't the time to go making new friends. Right?
All I'm saying is, anyone can put on a friendly face. Including Shinra spies.
They could be anywhere, waiting to pounce.

Thanks, but I'm not that naive.
I know a Shinra creep when I see one.
If you say so. Just...stay sharp, 'kay?

Oh, I will. Sharp as a tack, promise!
Now go─enjoy your date!
Aw, now you're just being shy. Don't deny that you were thrilled when this charming beauty came knocking and swept you off your feet!
Deep down in your heart you're thinking, "Oh thank you, Yuffie. Let me buy you all the materia you want!"
Oh, such a liar. You're loving every minute of this!
Lemme guess: got lonely up in the room?
Look at all these happy couples... Kinda jealous. I mean, this place isn't much fun by yourself.
There must be someone who'd hang out with a cool person like me.
We're not here to make friends.
All I'm saying is, anyone can put on a friendly face. Including Shinra spies.
They could be anywhere, waiting to pounce.
Thanks, but I'm not that naive. I know a Shinra creep when I see one.
If you say so. Just...stay sharp, 'kay?
Oh, I will. Sharp as a tack─promise!
Hmm, maybe I'll go and look for Red─see what he's up to.
Seems more like they're on guard duty.
Still, we should probably keep our distance, right?
You don't think they're looking for us, do you?
Seems more like they're on guard duty.
Even so...probably best we don't stick around.
Oh man, what're they doing here? Think they managed to track us down?
Seems more like they're on guard duty.
You get a free pass today, Shinra jerkwads.
No need to make it harder for yourself.
It's date night, Cloud! Forget them.
Are you interested in joining the fray?
Would you care to unwind with a good old-fashioned brawl?
Give us a holler when you wanna throw down.
Enjoy your stay at the Gold Saucer, musclehead!
That's Jessie. She died fighting for Avalanche.
You know she was an actress?
She was a good friend. Not that I deserved one.

You can be pretty dense when
it comes to that kinda stuff.
She gave as good as she got─never cut me any slack. And yeah, just a friend.
You, young man...still have a lot to learn.

Back when I was still finding my feet in Midgar,
I...ran into some trouble.
But she took me under her wing, helped me out... Saved me, really.
I admired her... She was so cool and confident.
Like nothing could bring her down.
What? No way. I didn't think you had friends!
Might've just been screwin' with me.
Yeah, well, you're lucky she even did that!
I swear, Cloud... It's like you're destined to be surrounded by smokin'-hot chicks.
Hey... Still waiting on that pizza.
Swing by my place after─so I can "pay you in full."
Marche, luche, black milly, red shelly─I use only the best stuff!
Her old stomping grounds. Should take a look.
Guess they're done for the day, huh. Bummer...

Just think...
your friend used to perform on this very stage.
Done for the day, I guess.
She was always a star, but just imagine her up there...
Aw man, they're done for the day...
Kinda cool to think this is where that girl used to perform.
You seem to be feeling better.
I'm hiding. Some children mistook me for a mascot. They wanted a photo with me.
Did you come by the room earlier?
To check on you, yes. Found you fast asleep.
No, I'm afraid not. Barret perhaps?
Anyway, glad you're on the mend.
You know, I could join you for a match─if you like.
You know, I could join you for a match─if you like.
I think I'll lie low for the time being.

Oh well...
Just means more time for us to explore the park!

Popular place...
Maybe some other attractions are open, though.
Lame... Oh well! Gives us an excuse to keep lookin' around!
We're not letting any more guests through.

I'm sorry, sir, but only authorized personnel are allowed past here.

It's like I told ye; someone went on a rampage.
And now─
As park director, it's my pleasure to welcome you to this, our gilded paradise.
We meet again, young man. If you'd like to go another round, I'm always game.
A director from head office was attending a colosseum match earlier...when their security detail was gunned down.
Both guests and staff were caught in the cross fire.
The assailant took care to knock out the cameras.

And so we have no image of their face.
But according to eyewitness reports...
it was a man with a gun grafted to one arm.
And that's when it hit me!
I knew this man. He was one of several fugitives we were warned to be on the lookout for.
Nigh as tall and muscular as I─yet brash and brazen.
With an ever-present scowl that smolders behind his sunglasses─and...

Tell me...
Does that sound like anyone you might know?
Barret might have a temper, but...he'd never do this.
Though I'd like nothing more than to believe you...
this tells a very different tale.
And what makes you say that?
The cameras. It's not his style to avoid the limelight.

If he really did kill all these people,
he would've had a damn good reason.

One that he'd want the world to know about.
He'd've made sure you had the footage. Trust me.

Well, you do not want for loyalty─
which is a quality close to my heart.
But this is a serious matter.
Mere character statements will not suffice.

Find me the true perpetrator and
I will declare your friend innocent.

After which, you will all be deemed complicit,
clapped in chains, and delivered to Shinra.
In the event you decide to make a break for it.
Now go─before the Turks beat you to the punch!
Our culprit awaits below, my scrappy friends!
In the name of justice, go forth!
If you'd care to follow me!
I will be your faithful guide!
And the elevator is that way!
I'll make sure they rue the day they besmirched my golden paradise.
I believe time is of the essence?

The place we're headed is called the Dustbowl,
and it is nasty!
Once upon a time, it was where the Gold Saucer employees used to live.
But when hordes of fiends started appearing, the staff relocated up top─where it was safe.
The buildings vacant, all sorts of lowlives, ruffians, and ne'er-do-wells swooped in to stake their claim!
Ah, the place it could've been... Tears me up inside!
Ha! A paradise compared to this cesspool!

Set one foot inside, and it's farewell freedom!
So long, dignity!
I mean...why else d'ye think they started callin' it...
'Cept this prison's got no bars, no rules!
Muggin', maimin', murderin'─it's all on the table!

In summary...
prepare yourselves for one seriously cold reception!
Top o' the mornin' to ya!
Whoa now, wouldn't try that if I was you.
Hey, Boss! Your guests are here!
Allow me to welcome you to my desert oasis, Cloud.
Cloud, right? The merc for hire?
Got it in one, boss man.
But which one of you is it?
Is it you? You? Maybe you?
I'm just messin' with ya! That there is our man!
'Course we haven't met! Ya got brain damage?
I'm not the type of player folks tend to forget.
Now, you may not know me, but I know you.
And why do you think that is, Mr. Mercenary?

And what kinda businessman would I be
if I didn't have the scoop on the man
who brought down Donnie C?
We're looking for someone. A man─

Hey there, hi there, ho there─no need to explain! Intel's my bread and butter!
Really gotta tell ya twice?
Which is why I'm ever so certain that you'll be useful.

So, the son of a bitch with a gun for an arm?
I got him under lock and key.
Out in the middle of the dunes.

Now, I'm a generous guy,
so I'd be happy to tell ya where to find him.
But only if I get a little something from you first. Understand?
That little somethin' bein' a shitload of money.
I want stacks of it, heaps of it, mountains of it!
I mean, did you hear what he did!? Your buddy shot Shinra troopers in broad friggin' daylight!
So I ain't about to give him up for free!

Ya think my prison runs on good deeds?
No, sir! It runs on gil!

So yeah, gil─that's what I want.
And relax! I know you don't have it on you.
But I got an idea on how you can scrape some together.

I'm entering you and one lucky chocobo
in the races─and you are gonna win.

Till ya bring home the bacon,
I'mma hold on to your piggies.
Chill out, kiddo. We'll take excellent care of 'em.

'Less you fail to deliver! In which case, well,
let's just say...there are plenty of other ways
to raise the funds I require.
Can put a price on anything.
As for all those pesky race details, talk to Garth here!

Alright, Mr. Merc. Let's go meet your bird.
Better stick close, y'hear?
That's right. You just follow me.
Or run for it─go on! See how far you get.
Hey! You know we still got your friends, right?
I just hope Barret's safe out there...
No need to worry about us. We can handle ourselves.
Good luck. We're rooting for you.

Hey, creepazoids!
What're you planning on doing with us!?
S'pose I could always ninja myself outta here...
Locked in a cage yet again.
But at least I'm not alone this time.
Well, this is a fine state of affairs...
You will get us out of here, won't you, Cloud?
Can't say I was expecting someone so pretty.
Aren't you that kid from the ranch?
Hang on. You two know each other?

We were makin' our way to the Saucer─
for Piko's racing debut...
Hold up! How 'bout you tell 'im the real story?

How you were dyin' out there in the dunes?
How we saved your scrawny ass?

Our trek through the desert did
a real number on him.
Can barely lift a claw. If he doesn't eat and regain his strength, I don't fancy his chances.

Good thing his jockey's on the job.
Piko needs food, and you're gonna find it.

Okay then! Grab that bird some grub and
bring it to me. I'll be waiting!

Having trouble finding that feed for Piko?
Lemme think...
Could ask the bartender? He has this garden he fusses over─or used to, anyway.
Hmm...I did see one of those scam-artist "lecturers" buying veggies the other day.
What about...oh─that stalker gang. Bet they got something. Might have to beat it out of 'em, though.
Oh yeah! Try that QB collector who's been hanging out down here. I heard he's got some produce!

Well...there's always Desert Rush.
Can win some veggies there.

Maybe check out that underground fighting ring.
I bet you'd clean up.
Thinkin' of makin' a run for it, are ya?
You wouldn't last longer than a day out there, pretty boy.
